News.Title: Balaxi Pharmaceuticals: Stock Surges 22% Following Bulk Deals
News.Summary: Balaxi Pharmaceuticals stock rose over 22% in two days after significant bulk deals. Ebisu Global Opportunities Fund and Unico Global Opportunities Fund each purchased about 8% stake, while MGC Fund Limited and Elala India Opportunities Fund sold similar stakes, all at ₹53 per share.
